summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transaction details for an account associated with Jeffrey Epstein at Deutsche Bank. It outlines deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments for the period leading up to March 31, 2018.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact person for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The document details account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for the period ending March 31, 2018.
A total of $10,000 was transferred into Epstein's account on March 8, 2018.
The ending balance of the account as of March 31, 2018, was $8,069.09.
Service charges and fees totaled $50.00 during the statement period.
The document includes instructions for disputing errors on the account statement.
